title: Captured
description: The much anticipated sequel to the novel HUNTED is here!CAPTURED SECOND BOOK IN THE HUNTED SERIES, EXPLORE DARK ROMANCE WITH A MORALLY GRAY HERO, TOXIC RELATIONSHIPS, TRAUMA RECOVERY, AND THE RISE JOF A VILLAIN. THIS SEXY AND FAST PACED STORY IS TOLDFROM VARIOUS VIEWPOINTS, MAKING IT AN EASY READ. NOW ON KINDLE UNLIMITED.
author: LaBrie James
